sqlMap.select: select count(0) as mallSaleRecords_COUNT,g.GOODS_NAME as mallGoodsInfo_GOODS_NAME from t_mall_sale_records s left join t_mall_goods_info g on s.GOODS_ID = g.GOODS_ID where s.MERCHANT_ID = #merchantId# GROUP BY s.GOODS_ID limit #num#
